'''Lordsport''' is a port town on the island of [[Pyke (island)|Pyke]], in the [[Iron Islands]], and the seat of [[House Botley]]. It serves as the main port and supporting town for the castle of [[Pyke (castle)|Pyke]], the seat of [[House Greyjoy]].<ref name="S2E02">"[[The Night Lands]]"</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Lordsport is ruled for the Greyjoys by House Botley. It is one of the largest towns and ports in the Iron Islands.
